the kids will be my responsibility as my husband does not want them.

I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon.
my favorite color is pruple.
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion.
My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.

content.text: I'm interested in hearing about your experiences volunteering.

I love volunteering! It's a great way to give back to the community and meet new people. I've volunteered at a local soup kitchen, a homeless shelter, and a tutoring center. It's always rewarding to help others in need.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy it. I've only volunteered once, but it was a really great experience. I helped out at a local animal shelter and got to interact with all sorts of cute animals.
That sounds like it was a lot of fun! I love animals, so I would have loved to do that.
It was! I'm thinking about volunteering again soon.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
